mapper.select: select da_nm, da_state, to_char(da_date,'yyyy-MM-dd') as da_date, da_price from drug_apply where da_date between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) order by da_nm desc

select A.DA_DT_NM, A.DA_NM, A.BUYER_CD, A.DA_DT_AMOUNT, A.DA_DT_CHECK, A.DA_DT_PRICE_CHECK, A.DA_DT_PRICE, to_char(A.DA_DT_PRICEDAY, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as DA_DT_PRICEDAY, B.DRUG_NM, B.ITEM_NAME, B.ITEM_ENG_NAME, B.ENTP_NAME, B.DRUG_COST_PRICE from da_detail A, DRUG B where da_nm = ${daNm} AND A.DRUG_NM = B.DRUG_NM ORDER BY DA_DT_CHECK, DRUG_NM
mapper.insert: insert into da_detail( da_dt_nm, da_nm, drug_nm, buyer_cd, da_dt_amount, da_dt_check, da_dt_price_check, da_dt_price, da_dt_priceday ) values( da_detail_seq.nextval, ${daNm}, ${drugNm}, (select buyer_cd from buyer where buyer_name=#{buyerName}), ${daDtAmount}, 'N', '0', (${daDtAmount}*${drugCostPrice}), '' )
mapper.select: select count(*) from da_detail where da_nm = #{daDtNm} and da_dt_check = 'N'
